project.name: J-C089A-POIX-09-ST03-DT03-DF12-CF26-01
project.description: This test creates a connection to the MySQL database, and creates a query string based on data in an array passed by arguments. This data is not checked for special elements, however, and it is possible to construct a query string that performs unexpected data retrievals or modifications.

iopair.name: J-C089A-POIX-09-ST03-DT03-DF12-CF26-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: convert a .doc to HTML Environment variable defining test value.

process.script: sleep 2 && printf "Sleeping to allow DB to be created."

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="USA" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
